mapper.select: SELECT dnis as dnis, menu as menu, cb_useyn as cb_useyn, crt_dt as crt_dt, crt_by as crt_by, upt_dt as upt_dt, upt_by as upt_by FROM givr.ax_ivr_callback_gr WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY dnis asc, menu asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO givr.ax_ivr_callback_gr (dnis, menu, cb_useyn, crt_dt, crt_by) VALUES (#{dnis}, #{menu}, #{cb_useyn}, #{crt_dt}, #{crt_by})
